allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Prepare Party Palace for Railway deployment

- Split CSS and JS into external files for better performance
- Add Supabase backend integration for products and forms
- Add product gallery images \(Chiara Arch, Specialty Columns\)
- Create Railway deployment configuration
- Add package.json for static file serving
- Update README with deployment info

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Migrate product images to Supabase Storage

- Uploaded 51 product images to Supabase Storage bucket
- Reduced app.js from 17.7MB to 1.4MB \(92% reduction\)
- Reduced index.html from 17MB to 95KB
- Created product_image_urls.js to map products to Supabase URLs
- Images now served from Supabase CDN for faster loading
- Fixed navigation button functionality

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
